content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, nice to meet you. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. The monthly rental price for 25 square meters is 800 Euros. Would you like to discuss further or agree to this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to discuss further. Can you tell me more about the building and the area?

I also want to know if there are any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of.

Also, does the apartment have any specific amenities or features that I should know about?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Of course, the building is a well-maintained and modern structure located in a prime area of Munich. The apartment is situated in a quiet street, but it is only a short walk away from the city center, shops, restaurants, and public transportation.

Regarding additional fees, there is a one-time security deposit of 200 Euros, which will be returned to you at the end of your tenancy if you comply with all terms of the agreement. There are no other charges or fees associated with this apartment.

As for amenities, the apartment comes with a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable living room, a cozy bedroom, and a modern bathroom. It also has a balcony where you can enjoy the fresh air and beautiful views of the city. Is there anything else you would like to know about the apartment or the area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month. I will sign the agreement as soon as I can.

I would like to ask about the lease duration. How long is the lease term?

Also, will there be any restrictions on pets?

Lastly, is there any penalty for breaking the lease early?

Thank you for your time and assistance.

TERMINATE
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your decision, Ryanah. The lease term is for one year, with the possibility of renewal for another year. As for pets, there are no restrictions, as long as they are well-behaved and do not cause any damage to the apartment or its contents.

Regarding early termination of the lease, there will be a penalty fee of 300 Euros if you decide to break the lease before the end of the term. However, if you provide at least one month's notice and find a replacement tenant, the penalty fee will be waived.

Thank you again for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
